alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:12PM CDT until July 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Union County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Alexander County in southern Illinois... Northern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... Central Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jackson to Cape Girardeau to Kelso, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cape Girardeau, Jackson, Scott City, Anna, Chaffee, Jonesboro, Oran, Benton, Trail Of Tears State Park, Dongola, Tamms, Kelso, Gordonville, Dutchtown, Cape Girardeau Airport, Olive Branch, Ware, Ullin, Thebes and Alto Pass. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 12 and 25. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 82 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
